name: Day 64
description:
This is my entry for LowResJam 2022. I was unfortunately unable to complete the entire game, but I did as much as possible within the timeframe. Special shoutout to Kathryn Hathaway for the sound effects!

Controls:

WASD = Move Character/Inventory Selector

Arrows = Actions

i = Open/Close inventory

Space = Select Item (When In Inventory)
